ch.unibe.iam.util.log
Class Log

java.lang.Object
  ch.unibe.iam.util.log.Log
public class Log
extends java.lang.Object

Provides several methods for logging messages of different severity levels. It can also be used to dump the state of objects to a stream specified by the user (default: System.err).

Version:
$Revision: 1.1.1.1 $ $Date: 2003/04/28 10:56:07 $
Author:
Pascal Habegger (habegger@iam.unibe.ch)

Method Detail

setOutputDestination

public static void setOutputDestination(java.lang.String pstrFile)
Sets and initializes destination stream for logging messages. Default is System.out.

Parameters:
pstrFile - Name of file/stream to log to.

setDumpDestination

public static void setDumpDestination(java.lang.String pstrFile)
Sets and initializes destination stream for dump messages. Default is System.err.

Parameters:
pstrFile - Name of file/stream to dump objects to.

closeDumpDestination

public static void closeDumpDestination()
Adds final XML statements to the open stream for dumping objects and closes it.

info

public static void info(java.lang.String strMsg)
Logs info messages.

Parameters:
strMsg - Info message to log.

                         java.lang.String strMethod,
                         java.lang.String strMsg)
Logs debug message.

Parameters:
obj - Object which triggered the logging message.
strMethod - Name of method which triggered the logging message.
strMsg - Message text.

                        java.lang.String strMethod,

Logs warning messages.

                         java.lang.String strMethod,
                         java.lang.String strMsg)
Logs error messages.

Parameters:

public static void fatal(java.lang.Object obj,
                         java.lang.String strMethod,

strMsg - Message text.

setOutputTimeStamp

public static void setOutputTimeStamp(boolean outputTimeStamp)
Sets flag for including (or not) time stamps to log messages.

Parameters:
outputTimeStamp - true if time stamps shall be included in output, false else.

setOutputPackageName

public static void setOutputPackageName(boolean outputPackageName)
Sets flag for including (or not) package names of objects to log messages.

Parameters:
outputPackageName - true if package names shall be included in output, false else.

dumpObject

public static void dumpObject(java.lang.Object pObject)
Dumps the state of the passed object to the destination stream using the introspection method toString of the object. It is strongly suggested that it will generate well-formed XML output. This is not required, though.

Parameters:
pObject - Object to dump.
